text: “Do not be amazed! You seek Jesus of Nazareth, the crucified. He has been raised; he is not here. Behold, the place where they laid him. But go and tell his disciples and Peter, ‘He is going before you to Galilee; there you will see him, as he told you.’ Mark 16: 6–7

As we gather in celebration of Easter, we give thanks to God for His steadfast mercy in spite of these troubles. We remember the ultimate price paid by Jesus Christ for our sins & celebrate his triumphant resurrection over sin & death so that we might live in fellowship with God.

To all who celebrate Easter, I pray it was meaningful. 

May this day go with us all year.

May the unmerited grace we receive in Jesus, compel us to extend grace to others.

May the unconditional love we know in Him, inspire us to more courageously love others without exception.
